Forrest Oliphant

Home Thesis Contact

the pump is broke 'cuz the vandals took the handle

2005-05-27

Some folk vandal set up a smokescreen of 275 usernames in folktunes.org. They didn't actually vandalize anything, so I thought maybe there was a message in there. The fake usernames can all be hex color codes. Setting out to find the deeper meaning, I made this. If you can arrange these colors into a picture, we'll know where the Antichrist is destined to be born tomorrow and can go rescue that dopey kid.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
To the perp: nice work, it's beautiful.

Then I was thinking that robots should be programmed to be folk musicians. I'm not saying that to imply that folk music is simplistic, I'm saying it b/c robots teaching each other songs and building off of each other's work would be neato. That's far in the future though, for now I'm going to concentrate on designing giant robots for crows.

« An Open Letter to President George W. Bush Apli »
